intro-header.en: Welcome to the Washtenaw County Prosecutor Dashboard

intro-body.en: A data dashboard and resource center to foster an accountable, transparent, and fair prosecutorial system in Washtenaw County.

credit-body.en: WCPO pushed forth the transparency project and initiative.

poverty-solutions-body.en: University of Michigan Poverty Solutions center manages the project's design and development.

aclu-body.en: A key stakeholder in the transparency initiative and primary funding source for the project.
